comments.body: you need a `defer ticker.Stop()` here or there's a leak
is it really worth holding up mutation requests for new endpoints just to list/print ? or do you plan to do more in this loop? maybe do it async if it's just printing?

Yes, am planning to verify more stuff in this loop. Any future sync-like activities would also go in here - like exporting to the kube-proxy REST endpoint that we currently report other things on (Tim has an outstanding todo on adding the list of listening port there).
